section.title: Getting started
section.para: There are many ways to get started writing your first Trentino application. We recommend that you look at some example applications and their source code first, before you write your own code.

section.title: Installing Trentino
section.para:
you can install Trentino from source code as described here
or you can download a binary distribution

section.title: Running the Trentino examples
section.para: Please select your example and run as described in the corresponding page
